General.Name: Regulus Resources Inc
General.Description: Regulus Resources Inc. operates as a mineral exploration company. Its flagship project is the AntaKori copper-gold-silver project comprises 20 mineral concessions that cover an area of 438 hectares located in the Yanacocha-Hualgayoc mining district in the Department of Cajamarca, Northern Peru. Regulus Resources Inc. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 2710-200 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1S4
